thread.title: Portland Timbers fans unveiled a giant Bob Ross tifo
thread.title_full: Portland Timbers fans unveiled a giant Bob Ross tifo

author: Hector Diaz
title: Portland Timbers fans unveiled a giant Bob Ross tifo
text:
Bob’s almost done painting too! 
The Portland Timbers fans go all out. In the last few seasons, they’ve unveiled creative tifos ranging from Freddy Kreuger , Mars Attacks , and even a giant 40 oz . 
But their latest work isn’t haunting or inebriating. It’s Bob Ross! The painter and host of Joy of Painting is seen calmly finishing up the Timbers’ logo. Those are some happy little trees in the banner behind the fans too. 
We can’t wait to see what else the Timbers come up with next. For now, let’s bask in the tranquility of of painting. Maybe let’s add another tree over there...
